item.title: WFC Stock Sees Red In Pre-Market As Investors Weigh Revenue Miss Against Improving Growth Signals
item.description: Wells Fargo’s fourth-quarter revenue of $21.29 billion fell short of Wall Street estimates of $21.68 billion, according to Fiscal.ai data.
